Summary Note:
The RM first met Evelyne Céline Müller at a wine tasting event in Zürich. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Evelyne Céline Müller is a 30 year old Investment Banker from Switzerland.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Evelyne Céline Müller is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Evelyne earned her secondary school diploma from Gymnasium Köniz Bern in 2012.
Evelyne completed her university studies at University of Fribourg in 2017.
Occupation History:
Evelyne Céline Müller is a 30 year old and comes from Switzerland.
At Credit Suisse AG, Evelyne Céline Müller held the position of Investment Banker from 2019 till now, developing essential skills in the field.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 60000 CHF, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 8150000 CHF.


In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 1450000 CHF from her late grandmother, a renowned Venture Capitalist, in 2017.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
